projects.name: Angel Mother
projects.des: All that I am, or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel mother! -  Abraham Lincoln

projects.name: With Love - from God
projects.des: God could not be everywhere, therefore he made mothers! - Rudyard Kiplin

projects.name: Life's hacks & tricks
projects.des: Life does not come with a manual, It comes with a mother! -  Unknown
